                id: { type: "integer", readOnly: true },

                name: { type: "string", title: "은행 이름", maxLength: 10 },
                icon: { type: "string", format: "uri", title: "은행 아이콘" },
              },
              required: ["bankCodeStd", "icon", "id", "name"],
              title: "Bank",
            },
          },
        },
      },
      description: "",
    },
    "401": {
      content: {
        "application/json": {
          schema: {
            type: "object",

            required: ["detail"],
            title: "CommonError",
          },
        },
      },
      description: "",

      content: {

          schema: {
            type: "object",
